education_text.0: Susan Dumais is a Technical Fellow at Microsoft and Managing Director of the      Microsoft Research Microsoft Research Northeast Labs, inclusive of MSR New England, MSR New York and MSR MontrealBefore joining Microsoft in 1997, Dumais was a researcher at Bellcore (now      redirect    Telcordia Technologies Telcordia Technologies), where she and her colleagues conducted research into what is now called the   Dumais and the other Bellcore researchers then began investigating ways to build search systems that avoided the vocabulary problem
